view.title: Configure default pricing rules
view.subtitle: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Pricing completed
blocks.message: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

requestBody.title: Runner submits snapshots and final report API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Agent-specific rate limits (different from human users)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Reminder before hold expires". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
